title: Quick sausage casserole with Savoy cabbage pesto
description: This comforting casserole is ready in no time, and the crusty topping and zingy pesto add gourmet pizzazz.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a food processor.
ingredients: ½ small Savoy cabbage, root removed, leaves separated and washed
150ml/5fl oz olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
salt and freshly ground black pepper
